1_executive_summary.purpose: Build Session Monitoring system (Sprint 5) that allows users to view list of all active sessions, monitor agent progress in real-time, view session details with orchestrator + agents, and preview agent output files
1_executive_summary.value_proposition: Enable users to monitor multi-agent session progress in real-time through a comprehensive UI that displays session status, agent coordination, and output files
1_executive_summary.real_world_analogy: Similar to building sessions-hub-monitor - systematically implementing each requirement to deliver complete functionality
1_executive_summary.use_case: User requests sessions-hub-monitor → System implements: SessionReader API to scan session directories and parse communication.json files, SessionsList component with real-time status updates and filtering, SessionDetail component showing orchestrator + agents + status → Feature is functional
1_executive_summary.output: Implemented 8 requirements: SessionReader API to scan session directories and parse communication.json files, SessionsList component with real-time status updates and filtering, SessionDetail component showing orchestrator + agents + status

primary_features: SessionReader API to scan session directories and parse communication.json files
SessionsList component with real-time status updates and filtering
SessionDetail component showing orchestrator + agents + status
AgentCard component for individual agent status with phases and output links
OutputViewer modal for displaying agent output files (JSON/Markdown/Text)
secondary_features: Real-time polling with SWR (10-second refresh interval)
Status badges for not_started, in_progress, complete, blocked
Security validation to prevent directory traversal attacks
